• Clusters
    • Accessing to Hadoop Web UI

Clusters¶

Clusters it’s Amazon EMR Cluster, that are creaating automaticaly while importing dataset with Hadoop Pig. List of all clusters could be found on this page.

Note

The link to the cluster, which was used while importing datased, would be displayed on DataSet details page. More information.

Accessing to Hadoop Web UI¶

To get access to Web UI you need to create SSH Tunnel by clicking Create SSH tunnel button on the right-top corner of the page.

After that the link to Web UI become available.
